name: Validate Necromancy Commands
description: Check that all necromancy commands are properly implemented
prompt: Review the necromancy command implementations and verify that all commands from the project overview are implemented: Movement (summon, banish, turnLeft, turnRight, haunt), Drawing (raiseSpirit, bindSpirit, conjureColor, setLineWidth), Utility (ritual, clearGrave, resurrect), and Game commands (castSpell, collectSoul, banishDemon, checkQuest, getPosition). Report any missing or incomplete implementations.
